name: Goal Clash: Epic Soccer Game
description:
Become the best soccer player with this epic tapping game online developed by PokerStars!

Enjoy ALL THE FEATURES of this soccer game FOR FREE! There are no locked features, so with this AWESOME free soccer game, the fun never ends!

Tap your way to victory with the best soccer league. Pass, shoot, score – GOALLL!

Do you think you can kick the ball and beat the goalkeeper? You are the soccer manager of your dream team, tap to score goals and bring your league to glory with this Idle clicker game.

Goal Clash is a casual kicker soccer game online that you can play for free everywhere. If you dream of being one of the greatest soccer stars, download this very addictive app.

* Visit the Soccer stars Leaderboard and find out where your friends are ranked. The best soccer player will be ranked first in the hall of fame!

* Earn stars in any move: catch the star as it rotates around your team members, increase your score by accuracy and unlock new levels.

* Collect personal rewards with every goal kick at any time

* Play offline - You can play kicker soccer offline and online! Not need for internet to play offline games!

* Login with Facebook, share with your friends and collect even more rewards. Compete against them in the soccer stars Leaderboard!

* Play through dozens of levels and become a soccer hero!

* It’s an easy to use Kicker soccer game online, all you need to do is tap your way to victory – GOALLL!

Don’t waste your time with any other Idle tap game, it’s time to pass, intercept, kick the ball and score goals to become a soccer player legend and earn rewards to continue playing with Goal clash, one of the best Idle Clicker games ever.

Download this amazing Soccer Idle tap game developed by PokerStars now and play for FREE!
